name: Admiral's Hat
effect: Hero sea movement, No penalty for boat boarding/disembarking, Summon Boat Spell, Scuttle Boat Spell, Movement converted between land and sea, Protects army in whirlpools

name: Angelic Alliance
effect: All primary skills +21, No alignment penalty, Prayer in combat

name: Armageddon's Blade
effect: Attack +3, Defense +3, Knowledge +6, Spell Power +3, Armageddon Spell expert, Immune to Armageddon

name: Armor of the Damned
effect: Attack +3, Defense +3, Spell Power +2, Knowledge +2, Following Spells on enemies: Slow, Curse, Weakness, Misfortune

name: Arms of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 5th lvl units by 2 per week in that town

name: Bow of the Sharpshooter
effect: No range and obstacle penalty, No melee penalty

name: Cloak of the Undead King
effect: Necromancy +60%, From dead allies, 30% are resurrected as Skeletons. If a hero already has the Necromancy skill then the percentages are added to the skill and the level of skill determines what type is resurrected: Basic – Walking Dead; Advanced – Wights; Expert – Liches

name: Head of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 6th lvl units by 1 per week in that town

name: Hourglass of the Evil Hour
effect: Negates luck bonuses during combat for both sides

name: Legs of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 2nd lvl units by 5 per week in that town

name: Loins of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 3rd lvl units by 4 per week in that town

name: Orb of Inhibition
effect: Prevents casting all spells in combat

name: Pendant of Negativity
effect: Immunity to Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells

name: Power of the Dragon Father
effect: Primary skills +16, Luck +1, Morale +1, Immunity to all level 1-4 spells

name: Recanter's Cloak
effect: No level 3+ spells can be cast during combat

name: Sea Captain's Hat
effect: Hero sea movement, Summon Boat Spell, Scuttle Boat Spell, Protects army in whirlpools

name: Shackles of War
effect: Prevents retreat and surrender for both sides during combat

name: Spellbinder's Hat
effect: Grants hero ability to cast all level 5 spells

name: Titan's Thunder
effect: Attack +9, Defense +9, Knowledge +8, Spell Power +8, Titan's Lightning Bolt spell (600 damage, no spell point cost)

name: Tome of Air
effect: Grants ability to cast all Expert Air spells

name: Tome of Earth
effect: Grants ability to cast all Expert Earth spells

name: Tome of Fire
effect: Grants ability to cast all Expert Fire spells

name: Tome of Water
effect: Grants ability to cast all Expert Water spells

name: Torso of Legion
effect: When equipped by a hero in a town, increases growth of 4th lvl units by 3 per week in that town

name: Vial of Dragon Blood
effect: All dragons under hero's command receive +5 Attack and Defense

name: Wizard's Well
effect: Regenerates all spell points each day
